Share data via an online repository

Source: R/mthd_share.R
share-methods.Rd

share method applied to Ready4useRecord

share method applied to Ready4useRepos

Usage

# S4 method for class 'Ready4useRecord'
share(
  x,
  consent_1L_chr = "",
  consent_indcs_int = 1L,
  gh_prerelease_1L_lgl = T,
  gh_repo_desc_1L_chr = "Supplementary Files",
  key_1L_chr = Sys.getenv("DATAVERSE_KEY"),
  options_chr = c("Y", "N"),
  publish_dv_1L_lgl = F,
  type_1L_chr = "prefer_dv",
  ...
)

# S4 method for class 'Ready4useRepos'
share(
  x,
  obj_to_share_xx,
  fl_nm_1L_chr,
  consent_1L_chr = "",
  consent_indcs_int = 1L,
  description_1L_chr = NA_character_,
  gh_prerelease_1L_lgl = T,
  gh_repo_desc_1L_chr = "Supplementary Files",
  key_1L_chr = Sys.getenv("DATAVERSE_KEY"),
  options_chr = c("Y", "N"),
  publish_dv_1L_lgl = T,
  type_1L_chr = "prefer_dv",
  ...
)

Arguments

x

An object of class Ready4useRepos

consent_1L_chr

Consent (a character vector of length one), Default: ”

consent_indcs_int

Consent indices (an integer vector), Default: 1

gh_prerelease_1L_lgl

Github prerelease (a logical vector of length one), Default: T

gh_repo_desc_1L_chr

Github repository description (a character vector of length one), Default: 'Supplementary Files'

key_1L_chr

Key (a character vector of length one), Default: Sys.getenv("DATAVERSE_KEY")

options_chr

Options (a character vector), Default: c("Y", "N")

publish_dv_1L_lgl

Publish dataverse (a logical vector of length one), Default: T

type_1L_chr

Type (a character vector of length one), Default: 'prefer_dv'

...

Additional arguments

obj_to_share_xx

Object to share (an output object of multiple potential types)

fl_nm_1L_chr

File name (a character vector of length one)

description_1L_chr

Description (a character vector of length one), Default: 'NA'

Value

x (An object of class Ready4useRecord)

Y (Ingested data, descriptive metadata and provenance details.)
